text: Upper Montclair is a census-designated place (CDP), unincorporated community and neighborhood within Montclair in Essex County, New Jersey, United States.New Jersey: 2010 – Population and Housing Unit Counts – 2010 Census of Population and Housing (CPH-2-32), United States Census Bureau, August 2012. Accessed November 6, 2012.Locality Search, State of New Jersey. Accessed April 19, 2015. As of the 2020 United States Census, the population for the CDP was 13,146. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in New Jersey Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey Category:Essex County, New Jersey
title: Upper Montclair, New Jersey
